pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sweave Drivers with Extra Tricks Up their Sleeve // Weave and tangle drivers for Sweave extending the standard drivers with additional code chunk options. Currently, these are only options to completely ignore, or skip, code chunks on weaving, tangling, or both. Chunks ignored on weaving are not parsed and are written out verbatim on tangling. Chunks ignored on tangling are processed as usual on weaving, but completely left out of the tangled scripts.
